text: honestly some days im just straight up terrified about the planets future like how do you even live with that weight climateanxiety

watching these protests unfold makes me wanna go back to school just
mental health crisis is real and its hitting harder than ever why is it still so taboo to just say im not okay we need better support systems not empty hashtags mentalhealthmatters

not gonna lie social media makes me anxious af but also connects me to people who get it its a doubleedged sword but im thankful for the real convos here
mental health crisis aint just sadness its trauma burnout survival
not gonna lie the thought of ai taking over my job keeps me up at night how am i supposed to compete with a robot that never sleeps jobsecurity ai

lowkey hoping ai takes my soulsucking 9 to 5 so i can finally chase my passion not all heroes wear capes some write algorithms silverlining

saving for a down payment feels like chasing a unicorn is owning a home just a dream now housingcrisis adultingfail

seeing young iranian women demand freedom is inspiring af they remind me that change is messy painful but possible sending all my love and strength
im worried the crackdown on womens rights activists in iran is getting worse it feels like hope is slipping through our fingers stay safe out there sisters staystrong
lol the regime thinks forcing hijabs will solve their problems nah the more you oppress the louder the fight gets iranian women are unstoppable resistance
its heartbreaking how many women face violence just for wanting freedom i cant imagine living in fear for wearing what
seeing families forced to leave everything behind breaks my heart war steals more than landit steals futures when will we learn refugeeswelcome

cant stop thinking about those kids growing up in camps they deserve schools and playgrounds not barbed wire and fear this isnt right
somehow amidst all the chaos i still believe people will rebuild and rise again resilience is real sending love to everyone displaced hope

trying to stay informed but its so overwhelming feels like no one wins in war only innocent people lose their homes and dreams enoughalready

cant believe healthcare workers are still expected to push

just bought a loaf of bread for 5 five bucks inflation hitting harder than my monday blues brokelife

watching those documentaries on water crises breaks my heart we gotta do better everyone deserves safe water no excuses
